title: 349. Q&AF: Overcoming Procrastination, Struggling Employee & Transitioning From Manager To Owner
itunes:title: 349. Q&AF: Overcoming Procrastination, Struggling Employee & Transitioning From Manager To Owner
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on what's the best way to attack & overcome procrastination, how to deal with an employee that's going through a rough patch in performance, and the best way to transition from being a manager into operating & building your business.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on what's the best way to attack & overcome procrastination, how to deal with an employee that's going through a rough patch in performance, and the best way to transition from being a manager into operating & building your business.
